entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Fog patches overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
